author: Jamie Pilsworth
comment: Great face, really alternative but please add customisation for date order. I live in the UK and don't use that format.

reply.author: MR.TIME LAB
reply.content:
Thank you for your purchase and feedback.
We are sorry for inconvenience you might have.
We will try to improve the watch face.
Thank you.

title: Add Customisation Please

author: Hoàng Đức Hòa
comment: Free for aw, why not for tizen :(?
